## Form.addEventListener() method

Add an eventlistener

**Signature:**

```typescript
addEventListener(method: TriggerFunction, filter?: EventFilter | EventFilter[]): object;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  method | TriggerFunction | The trigger function to be called when the event occurs. |
|  filter | [EventFilter](./forms42core.eventfilter.md) \| [EventFilter](./forms42core.eventfilter.md)<!-- -->\[\] | _(Optional)_ Optional. An event filter or an array of event filters. |

**Returns:**

object

An object representing the event listener handle.
